Reviews.Title: not recommended!
Reviews.Author: david almiron
Reviews.Content: the worst product of the brand that I bought sony!, fog lenses are just in contact with water, the battery does not last! when I probe for the second time in the water and decomposed me! not recommended at all!

Reviews.Title: Quality
Reviews.Author: sean
Reviews.Content: This is a badass camera. 16.1 meg pixel and waterproof. I took mine to North Carolina in some serious backwoods , got it dirty, wet, etc. works fine. Get it off Amazon and you will receive a bunch of accessories you otherwise would not get in the store. If I could afford another 100 dollars I would get a Go-Pro, but this thing kicks ass for what it is. The video is good and the panoramic picture thing is pretty cool. Great vacation/outdoor/pool party camera.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: GORDON R CARTER
Reviews.Content: I like Sony products they r very reliable. The camera work well & it water proof, Dust proof etc. Now l can go anywhere & not worry about the camera getting wet or damage.

ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TF1 16 MP 2.7-Inch LCD Waterproof Digital Camera Black Kit
